import React, {useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Button, Divider, Dropdown, Menu} from 'semantic-ui-react' const NavBar = (props) => { /* this is a handler for a navbar link item */ const [activeItem,setActiveItem] = useState({ name:'home' }) const handleItemClick =(e,{name})=>{ setActiveItem(name) } return (
KirayBet.com Tenant Screen Rent Pay Other Services help Important Announcement Discussion 
                  |
Important Announcement Discussion
) } export default NavBar
